articles.title: Donald Trump and the Scots: A not-so special relationship
articles.description: Past visits suggest the US president's latest trip to his mother's homeland is unlikely to receive a warm welcome.
articles.content:
Trump was made a business ambassador by Jack McConnell in 2006 and awarded an honorary degree by Aberdeen's Robert Gordon University four years later.
All of these can be easily justified by the nee… [+1440 chars]

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: German backpacker found after 11 nights in Australia's outback
articles.description: Carolina Wilga, 26, survived by drinking from puddles and sleeping in a cave, police said.
articles.content: "She spent 11 nights exposed to the elements and survived by consuming the minimal food supplies she had in her possession, and drinking water from rain and puddles," a Western Australia police state… [+940 chars]

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Harmony Summit: Inside King Charles's fiery gathering that shone a light on his beliefs
articles.description: The King's philosophy of harmony with nature was on display at the Highgrove summit.
articles.content: Highgrove itself has an example of the King's private sense of spirituality. There is a small sanctuary tucked away in the grounds, where no one else goes inside, where he can spend time completely a… [+2016 chars]
